comments.body: Can you add a comment here about how to build, if any special flags are required? And maybe include something like "Note: Support for MacOS is best-effort at the moment.".
@jdduke ok, adding recommended build options in the comment

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +165,169 @@# Note: Support for MacOS is best-effort at the moment.
# bazel build -c opt --copt -Os --copt -DTFLITE_GPU_BINARY_RELEASE --copt -fvisibility=hidden --linkopt -s --strip always --cxxopt=-std=c++14 :tensorflow_lite_gpu_dylib --apple_platform_type=macos
macos_dylib(
    name = "tensorflow_lite_gpu_dylib",
    minimum_os_version = "10.13",
